entry.title: Current Conditions: 14.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bow Valley 12:00 PM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: 4.1°C
Wind: N 10 km/h

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of rain. Snow level lowering to 1900 metres overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. A few flurries early in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 2000 metres in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016
